testcase.name: TC_02_validate_Watch_Tailer_Button_FrontTopTenVsSliderMovies

failure.message: The following asserts failed: 'Play Trailer' button not found for: Border, Movie (Border) - Play Trailer validation failed, ❌ Title mismatch at index 5 | Front: Eko | Slider: Ekō expected [true] but found [false], Description is missing for Mask, ❌ Title mismatch at index 4 | Front: Bha. Bha. Ba | Slider: Bha Bha Ba expected [true] but found [false], ❌ Title mismatch at index 1 | Front: The Eken Ruddhaswas Rajasthan | Slider: The Eken: Ruddhaswas Rajasthan expected [true] but found [false], Description is missing for Rambo: First Blood, 'Play Trailer' button not found for: Rambo: First Blood, Movie (Rambo: First Blood) - Play Trailer validation failed
